metadata.synopsis: The Baneite leader talks to himself while patrolling. He is quietly repeating lord Gortash's words back to himself, almost like a chant. He is zealous and utterly devoted to Lord gortash.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to 222; 16; 324observe the Baneite talking to himself

0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
0.text: 'Oppression is the price of peace - for only a unified agenda can bring order.'

1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
1.text: 'Free will is a poison, subjugation an art. Teach the masses the price of disobedience and they will be your enforcers.'

2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
2.text: 'We seek a realm without conflict, without ego, without free will. We seek unity. We seek the Ultimate State.'

3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Hahns Rives
3.text: 'Dissenting voices are infectious - and must be routed out. Only when the Black Hand's voice speaks in silence will unity follow.'
